hero.subtitle: No more stopping after every sentence to translate. Mingle keeps long conversations flowing continuously, translating in real-time as you speak and showing it on screen. Every conversation is saved in a chat room, and you can invite others to continue talking online anytime.

problem.label: The Problem
problem.description: You meet an amazing person at a party, but translating one sentence at a time breaks the flow of conversation, leaving only awkward silence.

beforeAfter.beforeDesc: Translating one sentence at a time...
problems: Conversation flow breaks while translating sentence by sentence
Can't tell who said what in group conversations of 3+ people
No way to stay in touch after parting
Have to manually switch language selection for each turn
solutions: Conversation becomes chat room, stay connected
Auto-detects any number of languages for two-way translation

features.label: Features
features.title: So you can focus on the conversation
features.subtitle: Mingle is not just a translator. It's the world's most comfortable messenger that lets you focus only on the conversation.

realtime.title: Real-time Translation
realtime.desc: Translation starts as you speak. Natural conversation without interruption.

continuous.title: Long Conversation Translation
continuous.desc: Long conversations are no problem. Translation continues while your partner speaks. Until you stop it.

autoDetect.title: Multi-language Detection
autoDetect.desc: No need to select a language. Auto-detects any language. Supports 3+ people speaking different languages simultaneously.

speaker.title: Speaker Separation
speaker.desc: AI voice recognition distinguishes each person's voice and separates the conversation by speaker. Works with 3+ people.

coreValue.label: Core Value
coreValue.title: Continue your offline conversation in an online chat room
coreValue.desc1: This is the true value of Mingle.
coreValue.desc2: Invite the person you met in real life to your app. Your translated conversation becomes a permanent chat room. Continue talking the next day, next week, or anytime.
coreValue.desc3: The moment a chance meeting at a party becomes a real friendship, that's

talkToWorld.label: Connect Globally
talkToWorld.title: Talk to the World
talkToWorld.subtitle: Meet people from all over the world and chat comfortably online.
talkToWorld.description: We'll completely remove the language barrier for you. Whether it's voice or text, just focus on the conversation.

cta.subtitle: With Mingle, you can have deep conversations with anyone, no matter what language they speak.
